TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生之前在绘制行控件。The event occurs before a row is painted on a control. 可将任何行中单元格绘制之前手动调整行的外观。 enables you to manually adjust the appearance of the row before any of the cells in the row are painted. 这是很有用，如果你想要自定义行，如生成其中某一列的内容所跨越多个列的行。This is useful if you want to customize the row, such as to produce a row where the content of one column spans multiple columns. 使用中的属性若要获取的行的设置，而无需直接访问中的行。Use the properties in to get the settings of the row without directly accessing the row in the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理事件以绘制选定单元格的自定义背景。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event to draw a custom background for selected cells. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#20)]

summary.span: 获取或设置需要重新绘制的 区域。

span.span: Gets or sets the area of the that needs to be repainted.

value.span: 一个 ，表示需要重新绘制的 区域。

span.span: A that represents the area of the that needs to be repainted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示的区域，需要重新绘制。The property represents the area of the that needs to be repainted. 例如，如果用户覆盖了整个用另一个窗口，然后将其暴露，然后表示整个。For example, if a user covers the entire with another window and then uncovers it, then represents the entire . 如果用户覆盖较小的区域，然后将其暴露，然后表示所涉及的小块区域。If a user covers a small area of the and then uncovers it, then represents the small area that was covered. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法在绘制时和及其单元格的内容自己。Use the method when you draw the and its cells' contents yourself. 如果您手动绘制的整个行和及其单元格的内容，请设置属性设置为`true`。If you manually paint the entire row and its cells' contents, set the property to `true`. 当是`true`，则和事件不会发生。When is `true`, the and events do not occur. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以可见的单元格的行的周围绘制焦点。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to draw a focus around the visible cells of the row. 该代码实际使用方法，它几乎等同于方法的。The code actually uses the method, which is nearly identical to the method of . 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#30)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供属性和方法，可用于自定义绘图。The class provides properties and methods that are useful for custom drawing. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来绘制自定义背景。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to paint the custom background. 在变量`e`，属于类型。The variable, `e`, is of type . 此代码示例摘自[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含相同的值的行属性。The property contains the same values as the row's property. 直接访问在可能会影响性能。Directly accessing a in the can affect performance. 使用在事件以避免取消共享该行，并保持最佳性能。Use in the event to avoid unsharing the row and maintain optimal performance. 属性为只读。The property is read-only. 尽管您可以设置的属性通过检索属性，新设置不起作用。Although you can set the properties of the retrieved through the property, the new settings will have no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来绘制所选行的自定义背景。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to paint a custom background for the selected row. 在变量`e`，属于类型。The variable, `e`, is of type . 此代码示例摘自[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以用于确定是否将行已被冻结，只读的或所选，其他状态。This property can be used to determine whether the row is frozen, read-only, or selected, among other states. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定是否选择行。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether a row is selected. 如果选择的行，则代码将绘制自定义背景。If the row is selected, the code paints a custom background. 在变量`e`，属于类型。The variable, `e`, is of type . 此代码示例摘自[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
